comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: This may be Wilson's granddaughter (by dauther Eleanor Wilson McAdoo) Ellen Wilson McAdoo, who was born in 1915.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: This is the 19th photo by Washington, D.C.'s Clinedinst Studio to be posted so far in the Bain/LOC photostream.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Ellen Wilson McAdoo Hinshaw (1915-1946); her gravesite: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=21039383 Huh, she's buried just a few miles from my house, in Inglewood. More about her: www.dmairfield.com/people/mcadoo_el/index.html

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks bior and pennyrichardsca for providing us her full name. Well add it and President Wilson's full name to the record. We have a similar photo in the Prints and Photographs Online Catalog by Harris and Ewing at www.loc.gov/pictures/item/hec2009004742/.
